title: Is Nocturne a Darkin?

embed.description: Witness the incarnation of vengeance. Part 2 of the Retribution arc.

body:
I am ALMOST certain that Nocturne is a Darkin.
First off, due to the new Aatrox rework I found a link between the skill names:
- Kayn R is called **Umbral** trespass
- Aatrox E is called **Umbral** dash
And now if you look at Nocturne's Passive, It is called **Umbra** blades
Also, Nocturne's body shape closely resembles that of the spirit Varus we see in his music video. (link attached)
In addition to that, Nocturne fits perfectly into the role of _"All Darkin must have unique weapons"_, As there is no other champion with such blades
Lastly, Darkin have been known to corrupt and invade other's minds. And if you read the description for Nocturne's E, it states that he **"plants a nightmare in his victim's mind"**, So i thought that maybe the same technique could be used to possess mortals. Now this got me thinking - During the music video, Varus **SHOT** a spectral arrow into Kai (or Vel i can't tell whos who), and that arrow was the key to binding Varus to the two hunters in the video.
**SO IS NOCTURNE A DARKIN? SOMEONE PLEASE HELP**{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Nice theory, but Nocturne is a Demon - an anomaly created as a consequence of the reckless use of World Runes in the Rune War.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=wJE2nAgV,discussion-id=NsQkFUfQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-20T23:28:35.474+0000)
>
> Nice theory, but Nocturne is a Demon - an anomaly created as a consequence of the reckless use of World Runes in the Rune War.

Originally, Ezreal created him after continuous nightmares in an attempt to cure them, however it went wrong and Noc was released on the world (the very original Noc lore) he technically wasn't even classified as a demon then rather a realised form of literal nightmares
Back in the days when 'Demon' was a description rather than a literal Demon.

wait where does it say this in the lore lul
i never knew

https://i.gyazo.com/3986c88279f099e5b2fccbcfeff82064.jpg

Nocturne is a Demon (yes, even in the current lore). We learned that from the Map on the Universe page of the LoL website. Demons were created as a by-product of the Rune Wars. We learned that from Evelynn's Bio.

I'm just putting two and two together. Nocturne is definitely a Demon, probably (but not necessarily) created by the Rune Wars.
aww okie! i guess the question's finally answered!{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I mean, it's easy enough to prove that Nocturne's not a Darkin without knowing that he's a demon. A Darkin is a single entity. Nocturne has 2 blades. You cannot trap a single entity in multiple weapons.

The Darkins have the common letter of 'a' in their name (Aatrox, Varus, Rhaast). Nocturne doesn't have that letter so I presume he isn't. Also, the other Darkins don't have any specific interactions/quotes with Nocturne which goes to show that the other Darkin don't know him (pretty sure the Darkins were created in one spot).

wait so did aatrox, kayn, etc have interactions with the pre-rework varus?
bc it was only after his rework that he got recognized as a darkin
also there are exceptions to the names, like when aatrox jokes about there being a memo (written for varus) about the "double a thing"

is this going too far tho?
I'm reaaaallly tied up on this bc it would be super - duper - mega cool if we confirmed the fourth darkin. Guys please help me out here :)
